mapper.select: SELECT t11.cell_id, IFNULL(t11.azimuth,-1) AS azimuth, IFNULL(t11.azimuth1,-1) AS azimuth1, IFNULL(t11.azimuth2,-1) AS azimuth2, IFNULL(IF( t11.diff1 > 180, 360 - t11.diff1, t11.diff1 ),-1) AS diff1, IFNULL(IF( t11.diff2 > 180, 360 - t11.diff2, t11.diff2 ),-1) AS diff2 FROM ( SELECT t8.cell_id, t8.azimuth, t9.azimuth1, t10.azimuth2, ABS( t9.azimuth1 - t8.azimuth ) AS diff1, ABS( t10.azimuth2 - t8.azimuth ) AS diff2 FROM ( SELECT cell_id, azimuth FROM lte_cell_param WHERE area_id = #{cityId} ) t8 LEFT JOIN( SELECT t7.ncell_id, IF( t7.azimuth1 < 0, 360 + t7.azimuth1, t7.azimuth1 ) AS azimuth1 FROM ( SELECT t6.ncell_id, round( degrees( atan( t6.x / t6.y ) ) ) AS azimuth1 FROM ( SELECT t5.ncell_id, sum( t5.xdiff ) AS x, sum( t5.ydiff ) AS y FROM ( SELECT t4.ncell_id, t4.lte_measurement_ratio1*t4.xdiff AS xdiff, t4.lte_measurement_ratio1*t4.ydiff AS ydiff FROM ( SELECT t1.ncell_id, t1.lte_measurement_ratio1, t1.lte_measurement_ratio2, t1.lte_measurement_ratio12, t1.lte_measurement_ratio22, t2.lon - t3.lon AS xdiff, t2.lat - t3.lat AS ydiff FROM ( SELECT cell_id, ncell_id, rsrptimes0 / timestotal AS lte_measurement_ratio1, rsrptimes2 / timestotal AS lte_measurement_ratio2, rsrptimes0 / mixingsum AS lte_measurement_ratio12, rsrptimes2 / mixingsum AS lte_measurement_ratio22 FROM lte_mr_data WHERE area_id = #{cityId} AND record_time >= #{begTime} AND record_time <= #{endTime} ) t1 LEFT JOIN( SELECT cell_id, longitude AS lon, latitude AS lat FROM lte_cell_param WHERE area_id = #{cityId} ) t2 ON t1.cell_id = t2.cell_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT cell_id, longitude AS lon, latitude AS lat FROM lte_cell_param WHERE area_id = #{cityId} ) t3 ON t1.ncell_id = t3.cell_id ) t4 ) t5 GROUP BY t5.ncell_id ) t6 ) t7 ) t9 ON t9.ncell_id = t8.cell_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT cell_id, sc_aoa AS azimuth2 FROM lte_structure_data WHERE sc_aoa IS NOT NULL AND area_id = #{cityId} AND record_date >= #{begTime} AND record_date <= #{endTime} ) t10 ON t10.cell_id = t8.cell_id ) t11
